dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Copyrighted Material]
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf Of
Policy Enforcement
Sent: Tuesday, April 04, 2006 7:28 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Copyrighted Material]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

For your review.
- --
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/


- -------- Original Message --------

- -0700 (PDT)

Subject:         [ABUSE] Copyrighted Material

X-Mailman-Version:         2.1.7

List-Id:         <abuse.lists.theplanet.com>
List-Unsubscribe:         <http://lists.theplanet.com/mailman/listinfo/abuse>,
<mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=unsubscribe>

<mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=subscribe>
Sender:         abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
Errors-To:         abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com



Hello,

According to this Whois source, you are hosting the site below which is
using a copyrighted article from our site, http://www.bestofthehome.com.
The site below has changed the content of the article, without our
permission, but left our author's name and links back to our site in place.

We do not condone, nor will we allow other sites to change our copyrighted
material and use it on their site. Could you please look into this matter
and see that our article is either placed on the site as originally written
or removed from the site within 24 hours.

Regards,

Kelley Wiseman
President
DMJ Enterprises
http://www.bestofthehome.com
http://www.dmjenterprises.com


*US-DIVORCE-LAYWER.COM*

        
*Website Title: *         us-divorce-laywer contains articles about Divorce
Lawyer s! <http://www.us-divorce-laywer.com/>
*Meta Description: *         We specialize in Divorce Lawyer topics for anyone
interested in learning more about Divorce Lawyer .
